scripts.start:angular: npm run watch:tailwind & nx serve cooking-ai-angular
scripts.start:react: npm run watch:tailwind & nx serve cooking-ai-react
scripts.start:shell: npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:dev && http-server . -p 4200 -c-1 --cors
scripts.build:dev: nx build cooking-ai-angular && nx build cooking-ai-react && nx build cooking-ai-api && npm run prepare-dev
scripts.prepare-dev: mkdir -p form recipes api && cp -r dist/apps/cooking-ai-angular/* form/ && cp -r dist/apps/cooking-ai-react/* recipes/ && mkdir -p recipes/assets form/assets && cp dist/tailwind-output.css recipes/assets/styles.css && cp dist/tailwind-output.css form/assets/styles.css && cp dist/apps/cooking-ai-api/main.js api/
scripts.build: nx build cooking-ai-angular --prod && nx build cooking-ai-react --prod && nx build cooking-ai-api --prod
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run build:tailwind && nx build cooking-ai-angular --configuration=production --skip-nx-cache --base-href=/form/ && nx build cooking-ai-react --configuration=production --skip-nx-cache && nx build cooking-ai-api --skip-nx-cache && rm -rf form recipes api && mkdir -p form recipes api && cp -r dist/apps/cooking-ai-angular/* form/ && ( [ -d form/browser ] && mv form/browser/* form/ && rmdir form/browser || true ) && cp -r dist/apps/cooking-ai-react/* recipes/ && mkdir -p recipes/assets && cp dist/tailwind-output.css recipes/assets/styles.css && mkdir -p form/assets && cp dist/tailwind-output.css form/assets/styles.css && cp dist/apps/cooking-ai-api/main.js api/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run prepare-deploy && vercel --prod
